Blacknightmare::

"I'm ready to open you the door... wait me a sec"

The femme started to checked where was Dragonfly and the unknow bot 
and later she would open the Blackfortress's door to Orchestra.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::The Bodicons/Skullgrin/Triggerhappy/Symphony/Orchestra
> /Composer::
> 
> Gutclaw covered his eyes as he was blinded by the flash Angel Prime 
made.  Explobody also covered his eyes.
> 
>     "That coward!  He's getting away!" Gutclaw hissed.
> 
>      Explobody transformed into his mechanical bird mode, and flew 
up, blinded by the light.  From the launchers under his wings, he 
fired two missiles at Angel Prime, barely able to aim them good.  
Gutclaw continued to cover his eyes in pain.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>      Decapitron went to where Motormaster was, and Legtrap and 
Headshot followed.  However, they heard the emergency alarm, and were 
informed of an escaping prisoner.
> 
>      "We'll get 'im!!" Decapitron, Legtrap and Headshot all said at 
the same time.
> 
>      The three ran out instantly, and saw in the distance 
Switchblade(I think) chasing Condor.  The prisoner, Condor, was about 
to leave the area.  
> 
>      "Quick, let's follow him!" Decapitron said, transforming into 
car mode, a sleek, black viper, and speeding off towards Condor.  
> 
>       Legtrap quickly jumped inside of Decapitron.
> 
>       "Let's catch up, then I can trap the prisoner with one of my 
traps!" He said.
> 
>       Headshot jumped into Decapitron as well, sitting in the 
passenger seat.
> 
>       "Ya, and I can also attempt to snipe him down, with a well-
aimed shot, very well aimed, to the head," He said.
> 
>         Decapitron speeded off in car mode, to try and catch up to 
Condor.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>        Skullgrin was blinded by the light.  He transformed into 
tank mode, and fired two shrapnel blasts up in the air, hoping to hit 
Angel Prime.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>       Triggerhappy was blinded, but he transformed into jet mode, 
and flew up, then fired 2 photon cannon blasts at Angel Prime, 
although he couldn't see well.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>       Symphony went back inside the CF.  He walked around, then 
went into the control room.  He looked around.
> 
>       "Hmm," He said.
> 
>       Symphony sat down, then he fell asleep, his head mashing a 
screen(or two) and some buttons.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>        Orchestra couldn't fight.  He wasn't motivated enough.
> 
>        "I'm outta here," He muttered to himself, flying off full 
speed to the BlackFortress.
> 
>        Once he arrived, he landed and went inside.  The first thing 
he wanted to know, was if Blacknightmare was still here.  He walked 
around, then he decided to send a message to Blacknightmare's comlink.
> 
>         "Blacknightmare, this is Orchestra, I'm back from battle, I 
think Darkfate went somewhere," He said.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>       Composer was bored.  He wanted to do something.
> 
>       "Hey, Wheeljack, anything on those weapons?  Hows about we 
speak to Zardus?"
